title: S4 Ep22: How central banks saved us from Covid-19
itunes:title: How central banks saved us from Covid-19
description: How well has monetary policy coped with the challenge of Covid-19?Central banks get good grades in a new VoxEU ebook. But Bill English and Angel Ubide warn Tim Phillips that success today may lead to problems in future.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
